text: Francisco "Kit" Sarmiento Tatad (born October 4, 1939) is a Filipino journalist and politician. He is best known for having been the Minister of Public Information under dictator Ferdinand Marcos from 1969 to 1980, and for being a Senator of the Philippines from 1992 to 2001. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Majority leaders of the Senate of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Bicol Region
title: Francisco Tatad
